Великолепная и неповторимая игра! Головоломки, заставляющие по настоящему включать мозги, уморительный сюжет (причём даже в кооп сюжет вплетён и очень даже не плохо), замечательное музыкальное сопровождение и картинка радующая глаз! Впрочем, всё как всегда у Valve, одна из лучших игр ever!
I LOVE IT!

Brilliant, just brilliant. The perfect puzzle game with great humor, awesome graphics and excellent game play. If you've never played Portal 2 and love puzzle games, then this is an absolute must! This is modern art in its purest form.

Definitivamente este é o melhor jogo da categoria “puzzle” que já joguei. Possui uma História excelente, com personagens memoráveis e uma bela jogabilidade, mantendo a qualidade de seu antecessor, porém com acréscimo de novas mecânicas, uma campanha co-op e um suporte para criação de mapas, aumentando o tempo de vida do game. Se você já jogou Portal e gostou, com certeza irá gostar deste também. Uma pena que nunca veremos uma continuação.

RECOMENDO

Portal- to me is a fun puzzle game. I'm kinda a "smart guy". I like to solve lots of puzzles. Portal brings it to the next level with some physics puzzles, complete with hazards and multiplayer. the actual game is longer and more replay-able than the original game, Portal. This game is the ultimate puzzle. the game is a First person character game, so when you are in a room, you don't get all the information immediately, which adds another layer of depth and mystery. you can't just have all the info to solve a puzzle, you have to move around and observe to get all the puzzle pieces. Only THEN can you get all the pieces and solve the puzzle. We can't just forget about the portal gun either, its the prime puzzle solver. like I said before, You use the portal gun to solve physics puzzles as well as hazardous ones. it can be used to explore the room and find missing info. Overall, its not complicated unless you look at it hard enough. Its a good puzzle game, alone in single player. With the addition of multiplayer, its a better game. its more complex in it's ability to make more puzzles and keep the game interesting, like giving the multi player characters axel and P-body cosmetics for multiplayer play. Its very detailed. If you have money, you should buy it if your into puzzle games.
Uno de los juegos cooperativos mas divertidos y complicados que he jugado. Imprescindible si juegas con amigos.
Very fun game, requires strategy and good puzzle solving skills. I have played it over a ton of times.

I would definitly reccomend this game! it has witty humour, fun levels, and an excellent portal system.

Valve умеет делать интересные игры.
  Сделать головоломку и оформить её как большой и серьёзный проект, а не инди-игру может только Valve.
  Очень жаль что от кампании давно нет никакой информации по "Portal 3" и "Half-Life 3".
 
  Ну и о игре "Portal 2":
  Это прекрасная головоломка с интересным сюжетом и кооперативом.
  А головоломка - это такой жанр, в котором ты можешь почувсвовать себя либо гением, либо полным идиотом.
  Но YouTube тебе всегда поможет пройти очередную комнату... Не правда ли?)
 
  Так вот, если твой IQ достаточно высок, чтобы понять как подойти к компьютеру, как включить его, как найти в магазине Steam "Portal 2" и как купить его; то рекомендую сделать это обязательно. 
 
  Ну а если ты и со скидкой в 85% боишься купить эту игру, то ты - роман Достоевского :)

刚开始觉的有些无聊只是两个门而已，随着章节的推进，剧情慢慢明朗起来，同时关卡的难度也在逐渐上升，有些实验室必须要仔细思考一下才能过去，我个人非常喜欢这种解密游戏所以觉得这个很赞。

游戏风格，背景音乐配合的很好。

给这个游戏评分的话我给9/10，剩下的一分是因为没人和我玩多人！
Portal 2 is how a sequel to a great game should be

How can anyone not recommend this game, I don't know. It's the type of game that makes you emote even if I played this in 2015.

I played Portal 2 Co-op before single player which is kind of odd, as my partner Blue just cleared all the puzzles with me scratching my head. After a few chambers I felt like I could solve things before I played Portal (1) and Portal 2 main game. Which is interesting because you don't HAVE to learn the basics and still be able to enjoy it.

2 definitely has a stronger storyline than 1, I just wish there are more explanation to what exactly happened and caused GLaDoS to be in charge with no other humans left. Much of the story was up to self guessing. The chambers will always give you hints within a restricted area and it almost feels very new and different everytime. When outside of the chambers, I literally felt FREE for Chell omg.

Can I just say the lyrics to the songs are so precious?

Portal 2 to kwintesencja tego, czym powininen być prawdziwy sequel: więcej, szybciej i mocniej. Wyższy poziom trudności, dłuższy czas rozgrywki i choć drugiej części brakuje prostoty i świeżości oryginału, to chyba żaden z fanów nie spodziewał się, że cokolwiek podobnego mogłoby się udać, choćby byli to nawet geniusze z Valve. Nowe elementy, jak różnokolorowe płyny, promienie ściągające czy laserowe mosty dały programistów ogromne pole do popisu, które skrzętnie wykorzystali. Nie wolno zapominać o prawdopodobnie najgenialniejszej obsadzie głosowej w historii branży gier.

Czy P2 jest idealny? Oczywiście nie: na tle bardzo wysokiej jakości całości nieco odstaje środkowy akt, rozgrywający się w środowisku bardziej kojarzącym się z Half-Life 2 niż z uniwersum Portala. Nie zawsze egzamin zdaje również humor, wciskany niekiedy na siłę w praktycznie każdą kwestię dialogową, a baza, na której opiera się lwia część żartów, to dobrze znane z poprzednika kompletnie poważanie, w jakim Aperture Science ma bezpieczeństwo swoich królików doświadczalnych - formuła ta dość szybko zaczyna irytować. Podejrzewam, że gra zyskałaby na dynamizmie, gdyby z ostatecznej wersji usunięto około 20% dialogów.

Nie zmienia to faktu, że w tytuł obowiązkowo trzeba się zaopatrzyć, aczkolwiek tym, którzy nie mieli okazji zapoznać się z jedynką, radziłbym w pierwszej kolejności nadrobić zaległości (nie zajmie Wam to dużo czasu).

PS: "I am NOT a moron!"

This is a game you simply must own and play at some point in time.  The Portal franchise has revolutionized the puzzle gaming genre.  Portal 2 took the few flaws that the original Portal had and fixed them.  This game is near perfect.  Just look at the ratings.  98% of people recommend this game, making it Overwhelmingly Positive.  If you havn't played this game yet you are seriously missing out!

Normally when you play a Valve game, you expect it to be good. However Portal 2 is definitely above our regular expectations.
Just on a side note, I've only done the story mode to this game however Multiplayer looks excellent from what I've seen.

I got this game with the valve complete pack, It's probably one of the other games from the valve complete pack that is for everyone, It's a short game, Child freindly, User freindly and most importantly Enjoyable. You don't need to be good at it to complete the levels. If you really do get stuck there are so many people out there who own this game who can help you, Walkthroughs on the internet ect ect.

The controls are fine. I had a arse of a time getting used to going through portals and judging when I should Jump for certain things but this generally happens to me because I'm definitely a stratagey gamer. The only downside I can see to the controls is The zoom function really doesn't help on quite a few levels where you'd think you'd need it, This downside is INCREDIBLY small so don't even bother letting this deter you from buying the game.

Graphics are spot on, They may not be from a blur trailer but they definitely give a nicer vibe than the origional portal did. They really make the characters like wheatley and Glados Pop out from the background and the standard black/white contrast from the first portal is still there. Sometimes the high contrast effect isn't that high and can prove difficult for certain people. But there isn't anything really wrong with that.

In general gameplay it's hard to hate Glados or Wheatley, Both attempt to kill you in this game and glados has been trying since the first portal. But wheatleys Idiocity really gives me the feel that he's harmless, and We'll be fine no matter what he does. Glados may be a little on the lack of sanity side. But In the end glados respects you. I mean how many games pull this off this well?

To conclude this rather rough review, I'd like to say I most definitely Reccomend this game and to anyone looking for a quick game that does have Mp Co/op and isn't too tricky. This is definitely for you. I rate this game 9.8/10, the only 0.2 being those extremely minor things that I would've liked to seen improved on, but hell it's hard to make a perfect game so good job to the team at Valve for making Portal 2 what it is today.
